alert.note: Alert for Jackson; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 07 at 1:27PM CDT until June 07 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTHEASTERN WHITE AND SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 127 PM CDT, Doppler radar continued to indicate very slow moving thunderstorms producing heavy to excessive rain across the warned area. Radar estimated between 2 and 4 inches of rain from Hickory Flat to near Sunnydale and Denmark. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Steprock, Denmark, Velvet Ridge, Heffington, Sunnydale, Hickory Flat, Dewey and Possum Grape. This includes the following streams and drainages... Onion Creek, Oats Creek, Butter Creek, Little Red River, Piney Creek, Fourteenmile Creek, Bullock Branch, Fourmile Creek, Coon Creek, Brier Creek, Holcomb Branch, Bailey Creek, Big Creek, Tenmile Creek, Potter Branch, Blue Creek, Hickman Branch, Departee Creek, Glaise Creek, Hopspinike Slough, Stevens Creek, Sugar Creek, Pumpkin Branch and Hurricane Branch. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
